replies.body:
^ That might be considered spamming if you do it more than a few times, and staff will definitely "give a damn".

Anyways, welcome to the forums! I remember seeing you a lot in Nebula c:

Welcome to Avicus! Be sure to read the rules ( https://avicus.net/rules ) and don't forget to check out our teamspeak! ( ts.avicus.net ).
Enjoy your stay ;)
